rows.label: tlk44400084_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Just when it got easier to find good
food, now a war breaks out?

rows.label: tlk44400084_03_msg0002
rows.name:
My daughter's getting very worried...
I thought warming up here would do us
both good, but no. How about you?

rows.label: tlk44400084_03_msg0003
rows.name:
The water here is heated internally,
from within the Divine Beast, so it's always
warm.

rows.label: tlk44400084_03_msg0004
rows.name:
That water is spread throughout the
kingdom. That's why you won't see
any snow in town. It'd just melt.
